comment: He is hard and horroble, he does not care about students at all.  I hope UNIVERSITIES get rid of him.

Professor Bobo has no respect for students.  He also made multiple derogatory comments about women as well as the Nursing program that we were all attending.  He did nothing but insult Nurses and Nursing students.  He does not teach any of the course material.  The tests are on the reading, which he does not cover in class. AVOID HIM IF YOU CAN.
